channel.title: Reg.exe on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Reg.exe on TLDRBins

item.title: Registry
item.description: General Key Hives HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE (HKLM) System-wide settings (SAM, SYSTEM, SOFTWARE, SECURITY) HKEY_CURRENT_USER (HKCU) Current user settings HKEY_USERS (HKU) All loaded user profiles HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT (HKCR) File associations, COM objects HKEY_CURRENT_CONFIG (HKCC) Current hardware config Query Key # Displays all keys, subkeys, and values recursively reg query <PATH> /s # Display all keys, subkeys, and values under CLSID recursively reg query HKCR\CLSID /s # Display all keys, subkeys, and values containing KEYWORD recursively reg query <PATH> /s /f "<KEYWORD>" # Display all keys, subkeys, and values containing KEYWORD under HKLM recursively reg query HKLM /s /f "<KEYWORD>" Add Key reg add <PATH> Add Value reg add <PATH> /v <VALUE_NAME> /t <TYPE> /d <DATA> /f reg add HKLM\SOFTWARE\MyNewKey /v MySetting /t REG_SZ /d "TestValue" /f REG_SZ Text string REG_EXPAND_SZ String with environment variables REG_DWORD 32-bit integer REG_QWORD 64-bit integer REG_BINARY Binary data REG_MULTI_SZ Multiple strings REG_NONE Undefined data Delete Key reg delete <PATH> /f Export Hive reg save <HIVE> <DEST_PATH> Privesc #1: COM Hijacking Windows 1.
